TopicTitle: Can I get help from any engineers!?

Articles.Content:
Hi, I\'m a high school student and I need to do an interview with any kind of engineer for my engineering class. Is there anyone that would be willing to help me out? If so, please look at the prompts below and answer the questions to the best of your ability and go ahead and send them to me via a mail on here.

Thanks in advance to anyone who helps me!

Here is what you would have to answer. Nothing too personal in my opinion.
Also, if you don\'t wish to share your email/phone, that is prefectly fine. You can just send me your answers via a PM and I\'ll use one of my email addresses.
